sentences.en: An adult or a young person who behaves in an infantile way.
sentences.cn: 大多数教堂给婴儿洗礼但有些人坚持给成年人洗礼.

sentences.en: And I will hear no more of your Infantile excuses.
sentences.cn: 还有,我不要再听到你那些幼稚的藉口.

sentences.en: He perceived that the rosiness and rustlingness were the tokens of her extreme and infantile shyness.
sentences.cn: 他看出,那绯红的脸色和沙沙的声音是她孩子气的极度腼腆在外表上的流露.

sentences.en: How is the face of infantile fertilizer OK thin come down?
sentences.cn: 婴儿肥的脸怎样可以瘦下来?

sentences.en: Master the acupuncture treatment of Infantile Enuresis and Infantile Malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 掌握遗尿、疳积的针灸治疗方法.

sentences.en: Master the differentiation , diagnosis and cautions of Infantile Enuresis and Infantile Malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 掌握遗尿、疳积的鉴别诊断、注意事项.

sentences.en: Objective : In order to heighten a know of infantile autonomic epilepsy.
sentences.cn: 目的 为提高对小儿植物神经性癫痫的认识.

sentences.en: Objective To understand the state and dangerous factors of infantile rickets.
sentences.cn: 目的了解青岛市四方区婴幼儿佝偻病患病的情况及影响因素.

sentences.en: Pearl was a born outcast of the infantile world.
sentences.cn: 珠儿生来便是那婴孩天地的弃儿.

sentences.en: Purpose To explore the technique requiring standards for infantile chest radiography.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨对小儿胸部摄片技术的凭价.

sentences.en: She wanted to form minds and hearts out of infantile clay.
sentences.cn: 她想在稚童的躯壳上塑造出聪慧和美好的心灵.

sentences.en: Some infantile actions survive into adulthood.
sentences.cn: 某些婴儿期的行为一直保持到成年期.

sentences.en: The treatment of eczema in children, essentially the same as infantile eczema.
sentences.cn: 儿童湿疹的治疗, 基本上与婴儿湿疹相同.

sentences.en: There is considerable dispute among specialists concerning infantile autism.
sentences.cn: 专家们在自闭症方面存在相当大的争论.

sentences.en: This kind of humour is infantile and boring.
sentences.cn: 这种幽默既幼稚又无聊。

words.tran_cn: 婴儿的；幼稚的；初期的；未成年的
幼稚症；[医] 幼稚型，[医] 婴儿型

trans.tran_cn: 婴儿（期）的，<贬>幼稚的，孩子气的，婴儿的
trans.tran_en: infantile behaviour seems silly in an adult because it is typical of a child
